languages.text: "Бедствие произошло во время прыжка через {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}. Я не знаю и не могу знать всех подробностей, так как был занят исполнением своих прямых обязанностей, но капитан по какой-то причине решил вскрыть посылку. Это оказало, как вы могли заметить, крайне разрушительный эффект на команду".

traits.locale_text: "Бедствие произошло во время прыжка через {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}. Я не знаю и не могу знать всех подробностей, так как был занят исполнением своих прямых обязанностей, но капитан по какой-то причине решил вскрыть посылку. Это оказало, как вы могли заметить, крайне разрушительный эффект на команду".

languages.text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."
languages.original_text: "Бедствие произошло во время прыжка через {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}. Я не знаю и не могу знать всех подробностей, так как был занят исполнением своих прямых обязанностей, но капитан по какой-то причине решил вскрыть посылку. Это оказало, как вы могли заметить, крайне разрушительный эффект на команду".

traits.locale_text: "The disaster struck during the warp jump. I do not know and would not know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the Captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

"The disaster struck during the warp jump. I do not know and would not know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the Captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

"The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

"The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}ジャンプの際に災難に見舞われました。私は本来の業務に集中していたので詳しいことはわかりませんが、なぜか船長が荷物を開封することにしたのです。お察しのとおり、そのせいでクルーに甚大な影響を与えてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}ジャンプの際に災難に見舞われました。私は本来の業務に集中していたので詳しいことはわかりませんが、なぜか船長が荷物を開封することにしたのです。お察しのとおり、そのせいでクルーに甚大な影響を与えてしまいました」

languages.text: “那场灾难发生在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}跳跃期间。我并不清楚所有细节，因为我当时正忙于我的首要职责。但出于某种原因，舰长打开了包裹。之后，或许您已经注意到了，这对船员造成了毁灭性的影响。”
languages.original_text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

traits.locale_text: “那场灾难发生在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}跳跃期间。我并不清楚所有细节，因为我当时正忙于我的首要职责。但出于某种原因，舰长打开了包裹。之后，或许您已经注意到了，这对船员造成了毁灭性的影响。”

languages.text: «El desastre llegó durante el salto de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Nunca sabré los detalles, puesto que estaba ocupado con mis tareas principales, pero por el motivo que fuese el capitán decidió abrir el paquete. Como habrá visto, su decisión tuvo efectos deletéreos sobre la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

traits.locale_text: «El desastre llegó durante el salto de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Nunca sabré los detalles, puesto que estaba ocupado con mis tareas principales, pero por el motivo que fuese el capitán decidió abrir el paquete. Como habrá visto, su decisión tuvo efectos deletéreos sobre la tripulación».

languages.text: « La catastrophe est survenue lors du saut {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Je ne saurai jamais vraiment pourquoi, car j'étais sur le moment préoccupé par mes propres responsabilités, mais le capitaine a décidé d'ouvrir le colis et, comme vous avez pu le constater, son geste a eu un impact destructeur sur l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

traits.locale_text: « La catastrophe est survenue lors du saut {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Je ne saurai jamais vraiment pourquoi, car j'étais sur le moment préoccupé par mes propres responsabilités, mais le capitaine a décidé d'ouvrir le colis et, comme vous avez pu le constater, son geste a eu un impact destructeur sur l'équipage. »

languages.text: "Die Katastrophe ereignete sich während des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsprungs{/g}. Alle Einzelheiten werde ich nie erfahren, weil ich mit meinen Hauptpflichten beschäftigt war, aber aus irgendeinem Grund beschloss der Captain, das Paket zu öffnen. Und das, wie Ihr vielleicht bemerkt habt, hatte überaus destruktive Auswirkungen auf die Crew."
languages.original_text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Die Katastrophe ereignete sich während des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}sprungs. Alle Einzelheiten werde ich nie erfahren, weil ich mit meinen Hauptpflichten beschäftigt war, aber aus irgendeinem Grund beschloss der Captain, das Paket zu öffnen. Und das, wie Ihr vielleicht bemerkt habt, hatte überaus destruktive Auswirkungen auf die Crew."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} sıçraması sırasında başımıza bir felaket geldi. Asıl görevlerime odaklanmış olduğum için tüm detayları bilmiyorum ancak kaptanımız bir sebepten paketi açmaya karar vermiş. Fark etmiş olabileceğiniz üzere bu da mürettebatta oldukça tahrip edici bir etki yarattı."
languages.original_text: "The disaster struck during the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump. I will never know all the details, as I was preoccupied with my primary duties, but for some reason, the captain decided to open the package. That, as you may have noticed, had a most destructive impact on the crew."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} sıçraması sırasında başımıza bir felaket geldi. Asıl görevlerime odaklanmış olduğum için tüm detayları bilmiyorum ancak kaptan bir sebepten paketi açmaya karar vermiş. Bu da, fark etmiş olabileceğiniz üzere, mürettebatta oldukça tahrip edici bir etki yarattı."
